description: This file is the entry point for a React application, initializing rendering by attaching the React app to a DOM element with id 'root', and rendering the main 'App' component inside React's StrictMode.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering the application into the DOM.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the DOM root.
